memberdef.name: helpInfo
memberdef.initializer: = "Shift-click to add or insert new points. Control-click to delete points. For more detailed infomation, please refer to the documentation."

memberdef.name: constantSizeTooltip
memberdef.initializer: = "If true, anchor and control points will keep a constant size when zooming in the editor."

briefdescription.para: Editor class for the creation of Bezier and Vertex paths.
